name: ChimeIn (RypIT)
description:
An alien crashes on a planet not unlike Earth and wakes up a month later. Now he has to figure out how to get back and leave as little damage behind as possible.

Will you clean up all the mess or will you leave it untouched to avoid causing further harm?

This is the first area of a game made for a university course about game world design with 4 other students. 
Voice acting by https://twitter.com/DominicShayler
